tool_description: Get rates for forex USD base and crypto USDT base
name: Crypto and Forex Rates
title: Crypto and Forex Rates

api_list.name: ExchangeCurrencies
api_list.description:
Exchange between two currency ( USD is base ) 
User can define Buy and Sell Fees also can define withdraw fee in percentage
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-and-forex-rates.p.rapidapi.com/api/exchange/iqd/try/100000/1/1/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-and-forex-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-and-forex-rates.p.rapidapi.com/api/exchange/{is_from}/{to}/{amount}/{bfee}/{sfee}/{withdraw}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-and-forex-rates.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
